body.p: If you're using NDOC then you're probably a developer so if you find a bug you can fix it! We love that!

But that's not the only way you can help. If you find any bugs or have any ideas for enhancements, please submit your reports to one of our Trackers on SourceForge. If we don't know about it, we can't fix it!
If you're interested in discussing the future development of NDOC, feel free to join our mailing lists.
